00020 {
00021   const libport::PackageInfo&
00022   package_info()
00023   {
00024     LIBPORT_PACKAGE_INFO_STATIC_VAR(pi);
00025     static bool first = true;
00026     if (first)
00027     {
00028       first = false;
00029       pi.dependency_add(libport::package_info());
00030     }
00031     return pi;
00032   }
